title: Current advances and future outlook of heterogeneous catalytic transesterification towards biodiesel production from waste cooking oil
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1105-1152
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01564E, Review Article
Nabanita Ghosh, Mehulee Patra, Gopinath Halder
The demonstration of disposal and utilisation of waste cooking oil as potential feedstock towards biodiesel synthesis by catalytic heterogeneous transesterification.
